website_summaries.verdict: If you want heavy-duty sticks that can handle more than just marshmallows, this is the set for you.
pros: Made of heavy duty stainless steel, these sticks are very sturdy and also feature quality wood handles
You can also rotate the sticks by just turning the black ring on the handle
cons: The paint peels off the handles if washed in the dishwasher
They also don't extend as far as some other brands

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy, have recommended to friends.
customer_reviews.text: So We used these for the first time last weekend - We shared our campfire with a friend's family and these sticks were superior to theirs. 1) They telescope farther 2) They are more stable (less wobbly) 3) They rotate at the handle, which the kids like. 4. The tines are closer, which worked better for hot dogs. No casualties on our side of the fire due to falling off. 5) They came in a nice carry bag, which keeps them all together and fits in my outdoor supply crate that gets hauled around all the time, so I'll always have them.
customer_reviews.author: Desmadona

customer_reviews.title: 1 Of my 5 sticks came broken-sad! They replaced it!
customer_reviews.text: Well 4 out of 5 are fine & we had fun using them roasting Hot Dogs & Marshmallows! But 1 is broken 😔. I’m hoping the company will replace it for us. We opened up the bag & extended them to check them out & 1 just pulled apart. I have grandkids & wed really like all 5 working-Thanks. Otherwise the are great! I called the Co. & immediately they replaced it-Awesome service & Thank you we love them!
customer_reviews.author: ReneeW

customer_reviews.title: Best skewers we’ve ever owned!! Real sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my daughters s’mores birthday party. They are beautifully crafted and I love the bag they come in for storage. They even have covers for the sharp points, which I appreciate for my young children in the house. You never know what they’ll get into. They have held up great with the thick sturdy metal that’s used. I especially love how you can twist the pole with a little plastic piece above the handle, so you don’t have to move you hand every time you want to toast the other side of you marshmallow. It’s the littlest thing, but it’s cool! Thinking about buying another set. I’d encourage you to get a set of your own!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Weenie Roasters
customer_reviews.text: I just took these out on their inaugural camping trip. They were great. They held two large hot dogs easily, with little bowing. They even have a little rotisserie feature—where rather than spinning the whole thing, you just rotate the little black ring on the handle. It allows for the ultimate level of weenie roast laziness. They were also pretty easy to clean. 10/10. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sunday Socks

customer_reviews.title: cute and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: These roasting sticks were great! We went camping with a group of twenty-somethings and everyone loved them! The design allowed for easy putting on and taking off of marshmallows. They were also sturdy enough for someone to heat up a bagel! The cute handle was also a plus! The carrying case came in handy and allowed for east travel! My only complaint were a few of the sticks turned a dark black/brown. I tried washing them (multiple times with an abrasive sponge) to no avail. But i contacted the company and they were able to help me out.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact these are. Handles are comfortable and these are very nice to use. They hold marshmallows and hot dogs well, and don't transfer near the handle so they are quick to cool down and use. The rotating feature makes it easy to get a perfect roast without having to spin your wrist around all the time. Best part is when you're done, you just collapse them and toss the bag into a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: This item came to me either broken or not fully manufactured. The fork part of the roasting sticks swiveled with any kind of weight on it making it impossible to roast/cook anything evenly. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Scharine

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars overall
customer_reviews.text: These worked for a beach bonfire we did pre-COVID. 5 stars for marshmallows in terms of holding and rotating but were a pain to clean (these are veryy sharp). I wouldn't let kids stick things on themselves because of how sharp they are - they could be a great self defense weapon if you are camping and a bear came. 3 stars for hot dogs. They start to get too heavy if you extend them out too far and I'd worry about permanently bending them. Rotating is more difficult with a sausage than the marshmallow but it's possible to put 1 on each prong if you're in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Well Built.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built roasting forks. Sturdy, made from heavy gauge rod. We purchased the forks for an end-of-summer backyard cookout with family and friends. Our guests gave the forks a good break-in and test during the evening! The forks passed the test unscathed. One feature is worthy of special mention: a knurled thumb wheel on the fork makes rotating food easy for even cooking. I looked at other less expensive forks before ordering this set, but the others looked flimsy and cheap. Also, other products had numerous negative reviews that sent up caution flags. I'm sure they would not have held up under our use. I'm glad I chose the Jolly Green set. They're well worth the small additional price.
customer_reviews.author: gbrin1221

customer_reviews.title: We have been using these frequently and the work great (aka they haven't broken which is much better than ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these frequently and the work great (aka they haven't broken which is much better than most out there). However, the bluish paint on the wood handles has literally melted off while washing them. Are these dishwasher safe? I dunno. I'm going to wash them like that anyway. But if you do the paint will not live through it. But they work!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how they were considered rotating skewers and thought maybe they took batteries and was reluctant to pay that much for them but my husband convinced me because he knows how much I love making s'mores. So it turns out that there are no batteries and you don't have to rotate the whole stick, there is a little black knob that you can turn with your thumb or 1 finger. It works fantastic and cooks the marshmallow evenly all the way around. They are sturdy and I love the extension which is long enough but goes small enough for easy storage. OK, they were worth the cost. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Nanci Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Storage bag arrived in disrepair
customer_reviews.text: Not pleased about quality. Storage bag was poorly sewn and falling apart. See pictures attached. Product arrived inside bag, so person who put it together must have been aware of poor state of bag and threw it in there anyway. The product seems to work but have not yet used.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Seslar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! So easy to use and so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They telescope out long enough without getting weak. We used them for marshmallows, hot dogs, and green peppers. They have a nice grip to help little hands hold tight while standing back from the fire. They come in a very nice and convenient pouch, so they are easy to pack and store while camping. These are one of the best camping items I have purchased in a long time! Thanks for the fun!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: making memories
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for my son and family at Christmas. They enjoy camping, and he mentioned that he had purchased some roasting sticks and found them to be so limp that they dipped toward the fire when making hot dogs. He is very pleased with how sturdy these are and gave a delightful laugh when he realized they could be spun with one finger for even roasting.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Great camp fire appeal !!!! Worth the purchase! These roasting sticks are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Ships fast. So far we have roasted hot dogs as well as marshmallows and made dinner and s’mores last weekend. Let me tell you these rotating roasting sticks do great !!!! My mother-in-law used one at the camp fire along with my husband and I. My mother-in-law thought they were pretty awesome sticks to cook with as well. Lots of compliments at the camp fire and they store great in the little bag they come with!! The rotation wheel on the stick works great ! Highly recommend this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Otten

customer_reviews.title: Fun In The Yard
customer_reviews.text: We have been meeting with family and friends in physically distanced groups in our backyard. The campfire is the center of the conversation. No campfire is complete without s'mores, so I purchased these roasting sticks for our gatherings. They are sturdy, extend easily, held marshmallows and also hot dogs. Everyone got a kick out of the extendable feature.The bag is handy for storage. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MED

customer_reviews.title: Works well for young or old
customer_reviews.text: When we first ordered these, we did not realize the rotating was not power - you have to use your fingers, but it's ONE HANDED OPERATION and works very easily. We had one in our set that didn't work properly, but the company quickly took care of that and we are quite happy with these. They fold up SMALL and fit neatly in a zippered bag. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bogey

customer_reviews.title: Very quick and easy transaction! Love the color and quality of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very quick and easy transaction! Love the color and quality of the product. Cute little carrying bag makes packing convenient especially with the safety covers on the tips! We bought them for camping and are very excited to use them this weekend when we go!
customer_reviews.author: Desirae Stiefel

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love the way they collapse to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Love the way they collapse to fit into the pouch for storage. The forks are stainless steel and great for campfires. You can use both tongs of the fork to hold sausage or hotdogs to roast over the firepit and they extend long enough to keep you far enough from the flames. Still need to keep a close eye on the little ones, but these are so much fun for them to roast their marshmallows. Great for turning meat or veggies over, too. This is an all around great product.
customer_reviews.author: GFD

customer_reviews.title: my grandkids think they are awesome. So you get a tentative 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: OK Zach, here's the review you've been nagging me about. Although we've only had a chance to use the marshmallow sticks once, and I, personally did not use them, my grandkids think they are awesome. So you get a tentative 5 stars. It will remain that way unless something happens to change my rating. The only thing I can see that might go wrong with them is the wooden handle, what with having to wash them now and then. But the telescoping steel stick part seems sturdy and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smores
customer_reviews.text: Nice product used them on vacation easy to store with the pouch they came in and the little end tabs make it impossible for them to poke through. Extends so they work great for fire pits
customer_reviews.author: Lupe

customer_reviews.title: Having the telescope feature is very nice but it makes the pole feel a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because we camp a lot and cook hotdogs and s'mores. Having the telescope feature is very nice but it makes the pole feel a bit flimsy. Also, the sticks rotate in the handle which makes it a little hard to cook a hot dog on all sides. The carrying case and tips caps are nice for ease of transportation. All the kids that used them loved these and had fun cooking marshmallows. The length is great because is does keep you far enough away from the fire so as not to burn your hand or get over heated. Overall they are a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: CHarp

customer_reviews.title: summer/camping essentials
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I always have fires in the summer and love roasting marshmallows. I'm a germophobe and I can't stand when people just use sticks off the ground and the sticks from local stores start to add up when you have a fire every week. So these are the perfect solution! They're a pretty color, the bag makes them convenient to carry and store, they're easy to clean, they extend to about 3 feet so your hand doesn't get hot, etc. What's not to like?!
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: NA
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter and her family just prior to an extended camping trip they are about to take. She seemed to like them when she opened the gift. To my knowledge, she has yet to use them. I was offended by your instructions to only put true remarks down. What would you expect? I think anybody taking the time to evaluate your product would not waste their time with an inaccurate review.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B Houk

customer_reviews.title: Great for Camping
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my parents to keep in their camping trailer, as an alternative to having to store long skewers in their limited pantry space. We haven't had a chance to try the sticks out yet, but I love the fact that they telescope, and that they come with a bag to keep them together. They look like they'll be able to handle hot dogs as well as marshmallows, too! These would be a great gift for someone with a camper trailer or likes to camp and pack light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: oops
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this set because of the color and quick arrival time. We used them several times for marshmallows when we were camping this weekend. Unfortunately, my daughter sat on the rod of hers when she sat it down in her camping chair and forgot that it was there and it snapped (she's not very big), so we are already down one rod. Otherwise, we will continue to use the others :).
customer_reviews.author: elizabashley

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy your campfire experience.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for the quality in its design. We have used a few different types of marshmallow roasting tongs? and these are the best. Like I said in another post I plan to purchase a few more of these as gifts for my camping friends and family, plus one or two more for my own stock pile. You will not regret purchasing these roasters. PS they also hold hotdogs and probably other items equally as well. Enjoy your campfire!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Took these camping in Nevada City this last week and used them every night. They were perfect. Long, sturdy, pretty aqua blue wood handles, nice canvas bag, and even have a little rotating dial for easy roasting. Love them! They seem quality, and I’m glad I searched a little deeper through the millions of choices to find these.
customer_reviews.author: CAmomof3

customer_reviews.title: These are the best telescoping roasters i tried
customer_reviews.text: These are the best telescoping roasters i tried. They don't bend under the stress of a CubScout and you can turned them with two fingers while holding the handle (one hand turning is awesome). The only downside is that I put them on the dishwasher and the paint started to peel off. I don't mind the paint being off.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Great skewers for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: These worked great on our last campout. You can cook two marshmallows or a hot dog on a skewer. All my kids were able to use them and they clean up well - just placed them in the water bucket and scrubbed them up. They will discolor a bit if you leave them in the fire. How do I know this? My 7 yr old decided to "clean" off the stickiness. This did not, however, hurt the integrity of the skewer. It just marks his for future use ;)
customer_reviews.author: R. Guy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic marshmallow roasters!
customer_reviews.text: The seller took the time to email (even if it was a chain email, it's still a great marketing tactic) asking if we'd received the skewers. They work amazingly well, are easy enough for our 4 year old daughter to use, and a beautiful color. They're also incredibly easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my friends birthday and actually ended up stealing one out of the package before I wrapped it up. I LOVE it. So east to pack and travel with. The fact that they spin gives you the optimal toasty mellow. My only wish is that they came in other colors (I have too many things that are seafoam teal/green, I'd like to mix it up a little bit). But man oh man, if they ever come out with another color I am definitely getting a whole set for myself. I'll even consider giving my friend back the one I stole.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: Upgrading...
customer_reviews.text: I felt ridiculous ordering marshmallow roasting sticks, having always been of the 'just find a good stick' school of marshmallow roasting, but with a move to a less wooded area, and using a fire pit instead of a campfire, that scenario was posing a challenge. These are the solution! I have to admit, I haven't tried two at once yet, wanting to ensure I get uniform toastiness all the way around the marshmallow, but who knows? I may feel adventurous one of these days and just throw caution to the wind....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store!
customer_reviews.text: We had two long fixed roasting sticks for 6-12 people and a brand new fire pit. I've always hated the fixed sticks because they are so hard to store. When I saw these and all the features/reviews I decided to try them. The seller exactly described the item(s) and was prompt. We've used them several times already. A win!
customer_reviews.author: PattyBurger

customer_reviews.title: Broke The First Time!
customer_reviews.text: The very first time we opened the package to use these, my husband tapped this one on the campground table lightly and this happened. The fork end bent and then broke off completely. The other 4 worked fine for 2 days of camping. But I don’t have a lot of faith in how they’ll last long term.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: For the Kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for camping. They work good for hot dogs but the marshmallows were a small challenge. The kids had to pull the marshmallows off and place them on crackers instead of being able to the the marshmallows off the stick with the crackers. More of a review from the kidos. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: VooDooChili00

customer_reviews.title: Look nice and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely better than some of the cheapo skewers in the stores. If they could be just a bit more sturdy that would be great however overall these are pretty darn good. The rotating piece by the handle is fun for the kids. It's nice that it came with a case to store all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Blonde

customer_reviews.title: Durable✓, convenient✓ and adorable✓
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these roasting sticks for a recent camping trip I went on. Let my start off by saying that the bag that the roasters come in is adorable, it's very durable material and the zipper even lasted a chewing session with my dog. The roasters themselves are great at well. I love the wood handle and the color (it's my favorite). The rotating thing (sorry I don't know the proper term) is so convenient and I honestly bragged about it to everyone when I brought them out to make smores! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids and adults! Everything stays put on the sturdy roasters. They aren't super sharp and dangerous for the kiddos, but easily pierce the food. Cleaning them has been a breeze! I really liked the feature that allowed me to spin the marshmallows while roasting...I had the prefect S'mores
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: I'll never use a stick or hanger for s'mores again...
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought these for safety reasons- not so much space- because I didn't want anyone bringing long sticks or hangers camping as I have a young child. Honestly, I bought a few more sets. They have safety bobs on the ends so no one gets skewered. They are small and lightweight- ill be taking a set backpacking. Excellent quality and I love that they come with with a bag. Perfect length. Makes it easy to clean, store, etc. I'll definitely be getting my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: High quality materials and craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: We roast bratwurst, hot dogs, and even skewered meats over our backdoor firepit a lot. I have always been a cheapskate, so in the past I have fashioned skewers out of clothes hangers, wooden sticks and duct tape; however, I splurged and spent a little money and bought these high quality skewers. The ability to rotate the skewers with one hand is extremely helpful, particularly when you are holding a grandchild in your lap. I am glad I splurged and bought these. Campfire cooking will be enjoyable for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D. Coco Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced
customer_reviews.text: They feel pretty sturdy. The little kids were able to use them as well as all the adults. They extend very easily. Clean up pretty well. We have a very well used fire pit and have always used the hot ash to clean them. When the handle retracts you have to get really close to the heat.. Overall, a pretty good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiim Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Quality Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: I am super excited about this product. I have yet to test it out. Though, I did take a couple of the forks out to check out the quality. It’s sturdy, metal extender is very well made! Not at all flimsy or could be easily broken after a few uses. This is a gift for my little guy because he loves roasting marshmallows! Really excited about putting these to good use as the quality of the product was made by someone who kept children in mind of putting these into use besides roasting..Hint possible sword fighting! Deiniftely will provide an update once we’ve put it into good use!
customer_reviews.author: SKGuest

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These roasting sticks are very sturdy and super cute. I love that they telescope out and then can be easily rotated by hand for even cooking. The little travel bag is so nice to keep them all together and clean when they are not being used. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: The best set ever!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter & I bought this cute set for my husband for his birthday. We used them on our epic trip this summer & loved them. We needed a gift for my dearest friend and bought a set for her & her family! You won't go wrong with this great Marshmallow Roasting set.
customer_reviews.author: C. Overturf

customer_reviews.title: Best roasting skewer ever
customer_reviews.text: recently bought and was not disappointed with the result. these are heavy duty skewers and worked fantastically. the rotating feature is one of best. it got even roast on the marshmallow. i highly recommend this for your next bonfire outing or camping
customer_reviews.author: Tony Lu

customer_reviews.title: ... took one use to know I had made a good purchase. I LOVE the fact that they are ...
customer_reviews.text: It only took one use to know I had made a good purchase. I LOVE the fact that they are telescoping, and come with a nice storage bag. They are well made. At first we couldn't figure out what the dial was for at the top of the handle, and then we figured out it was for turning the stick, and it's so easy to do with your thumb. We just might have to go up the canyon more often now! We took a package of baby wipes for cleaning sticky fingers, and they worked great to clean the roasting sticks so we could just put them back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great roasting sticks! Very well made. Heavy duty but light weight. We like the easy rotating ring. You can hold it with one hand and rotate with your thumb. Love the cute bag that it comes with. Great to keep them all together and easier to find. They seem like they’ll last a loooong time. Cute set, so will definitely be keeping it in mind as a gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lee

customer_reviews.title: Far better than a sharp stick, but....
customer_reviews.text: These are very nicely made, and feel great in your hand, but the tines of the fork on the end are two close together for two marshmallows and too far apart for one. Almost perfect, but not quite. Love the rotisserie function though!
customer_reviews.author: Photog

customer_reviews.title: Can turn from the handle and easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: Used these on a campout for smores. Telescoping pole make it easy to pack away taking little space. Comes with a small bag to store the sticks in. Also like there's a small circle near the handle you can turn with your fingers to rotate whatever you're cooking over the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camp Fire Cookers!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Didn't even know it spins 360° until we got it. Was a little wide for the square marshmallows, so had to be creative in getting them on but loved them. Convenient collapsibility, and comes in a nice little zip baggy. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift. After three annoying emails requesting my review, all I can say is they look nice, they arrived quickly, and I expect them to work just fine. If they don't I'll amend my review after the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: BabsnPA

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love s'mores?
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet but arrived as described. Only concern is the wood handle part isn't fixed to the steel center so it moves around a little. Probably won't be an issue but could see it rotating when you put different weighted items on either side? I like how they can be different lengths which helps packing them for travel and different uses.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jackson

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. The rotisserie wheel keeps marshmallows from burning so easily. The telescoping shaft makes any length possible and perfect for fire safety of all ages. This is way better than I anticipated and is causing us to eat far too many marshmallows!
customer_reviews.author: JMoon54

customer_reviews.title: Good  buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to use these yet as it is the middle of winter but they seem to be a good sturdy product. As with any extendable roasting forks there is still some play in them once they are fully extended but still seem well made. I do like the rotating function, hopefully once my kids get used to them I won't have to worry about them dropping the sticks while trying to rotate the whole stick in there hands. As an initial review I would definitely recommend these to others but will update once I get the chance to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Good, not the best
customer_reviews.text: These do the trick but I’ve got another set on Amazon I think are better. I don’t care for the spinning handle. The handle diameter could be larger. They do clean pretty easy and seem sturdy. Overall they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: A gift for our son at his request
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for our son who will not be receiving them until January 2019. The shipment arrived quickly and in tact. I will ask him how they are after he has a chance to use them. So for right now all AOK.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected very thin.
customer_reviews.text: This item is not durable as I thought it would be. I don't think this product will hold up well after one or two times in the fire. Cheaply made! Disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: Diana P.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra $$$. I made sure to look a weight of product for my decision and glad I spent a few dollars more on the heavier one. My grandchildren can use with no flimsiest to worry about. Looks like they will outlast their need
customer_reviews.author: Mast

customer_reviews.title: Great extendable roasting stick.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews for extendable roasting sticks I feel like I made the best decision in these. They're sturdy. Can easily hold a hotdog. Easy to pack away. The little black spinner was definitely a bonus. The extra dollars spent on these compared to others seems worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Boyett

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had these when I was camping!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these yet so I'm giving them a 4 for now. Arrived almost immediately. Good follow-up by Zach and customer service. What I really like about these forks is that they are sturdy and the bag they come in is heavy duty with a good zipper - perfect for camping trips. I also like the that they have a lifetime guarantee! My grandson will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ArcticDi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This product its very good we like a lot. Pro: Price, quality and built Cons: The product itself have nothing bad but just one observation and its that the ends are very sharp so please be aware with kids and for those that cant wait for their marshmallows remember the ends are metal and get very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jose R.

customer_reviews.title: Survived My Kids
customer_reviews.text: Took these out for Memorial Day camping trip this last weekend. These are rad, my son loves that you can spin them with the little black knob on the handle and still hold the handle still- hes not very gracefull and would usually drop the old ones in the fire :) Super portable, as they telescope up n down. Decent length to keep kiddos far enough from the fire. The lil bag is decent too, and I'll likely keep them in it for storing. I like the color we got, the mint kinda color. Worked well for brats too! Neat little product!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: After searching for the perfect roasting sticks
customer_reviews.text: After searching for the perfect roasting sticks, I finally settled on these and I am so glad I did. There are 5 sturdy telescoping sticks that are small for easy storage, but extend outward for roasting. I love the piece at the handle that allows you to easily rotate the stick in the fire for even roasting, something most other sticks don't provide. The matching bag was a huge factor in my decision as well, it holds all sticks with room for extra items, keeping everything nicely organized and easily portable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping Option- Best 'Mallow roast
customer_reviews.text: We used these on our recent camping trip. I enjoyed the telescoping option once I realized what it did (rotates the skewer without roating my wrist). Got a very good roast on my 'mallows and dogs. Would recommend. Ours did not melt in the fire, some burn marks as to be expected. Easy enough to clean the mallow off. Fork is kinda sharp, careful when putting back ont he protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Used them 3 times. Handle broke when cleaning. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: High quality, nice features and good price. I bought them twice!
customer_reviews.text: These marshmallow sticks are the best. So much so, I bought them a second time after the first set was stolen in a home break-in. (They're so useful, even criminals want them!) The stick is study, the handle stays cool and the double-prong is handy for two marshmallows or to keep a hot dog securely attached to cook in the fire pit and my kids love the ability to twirl them at the handle instead of moving their wrist around. A quality product that cleans up easily!
customer_reviews.author: A. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: What a great purchase! This was bought as a gift for my son and his family. One of their favorite things to do with their neighbors is to hang out all together and roast marshmallows and make s'mores. They all enjoy the special time together, young and old alike. This will be perfect for them to share and make memories. I may have to pick up a few more for their neighbors too!
customer_reviews.author: Maggio0000

customer_reviews.title: Carrying case arrived falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Bought these ahead of a camping trip. Box is beat up and the stitching in the carrying bag is falling apart. Don't have time to return, but for the price, I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deane

customer_reviews.title: Our Favorite Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a gift for a family member for Christmas and they were an immediate hit! We fired up the fire pit and made s’mores. We loved the expandable handles and the ease of cleaning and storing in their own little bag
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for entire family!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell you enough how much I love these. We’ve had them about 2 weeks and used them a few times already. I love with little kids they extend so they aren’t close to the fire. The ends are super sharp so I appreciate the rubber caps they send. I only hope I don’t lose them! And the bag is wonderful. I know in my kitchen where the entire set is. We pull the bag out and go to the deck and we’re ready to roast!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: So compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how sturdy these were. I like the wood handles because then you can't burn your hands as the heat moves up the metal part of the skewer. Being able to rotate the skewer without having to flip the whole thing makes it easier to keep the marshmallow/hot dog on the stick and roast more evenly. Easy to clean and store (because of the telescoping), and have a durable storage bag they go in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking roasting sticks that haven't been used yet.
customer_reviews.text: Given that it is the dead of winter and we aren't leaving the house very much, we have not yet used this product. However, I think these roasting sticks are going to work well in our backyard fire pit. Previously we were using sticks we found on the ground and extra-long forks, so anything is an improvement from there.
customer_reviews.author: Leah A. Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for the price that the handles would've been of better quality, but it's just cheap plastic. One of them was completely broken when it arrived and we had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Ceyzanne McBride

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy
customer_reviews.text: They are great, I was excited to try them. However for me they seemed a little heavy for backpacking. Convenient, compact, and sleek... great for all except backpacking
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping for the win!
customer_reviews.text: I just got these & cannot wait to use them. They seem well made & sturdy. Love the telescoping feature so you do not have to store long poles. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ilouvreart

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED WITH OUR PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. Durable, easy to use and clean. The skewers come in a very nice carrying case. Neat and compact. The grandkids roasted hot dogs and then made s'mores last night. We had a ball and made lasting memories. The customer service is super personal and reliable. They really bend over backwards to satisfy their customers. That alone sets them apart from the rest. We're 100% satisfied and highly recommend these telescoping skewers.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Works well. The tips are sharpened, but not ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The tips are sharpened, but not too sharp. The entire thing can be rotated while still holding onto the handle in a stationary position. The only gripe/concern is one of the five handles have cracks in them even before the first use... not sure if this is a manufacturing defect or shipping damage. The other four handles do not show this. updated from 3 to 5 stars due to customer support.
customer_reviews.author: K. U.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for S'mores Night!
customer_reviews.text: These roasting sticks showed up on time - they look good and appear to be sturdily made. Tried them out last weekend roasting marshmallows for s'mores we shared after our Anniversary dinner. Will get many more uses out of these - thanks!
customer_reviews.author: james brewer

customer_reviews.title: These are the best skewers ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best skewers ever! Easy to use and especially love the fact that they are telescoping skewers! Makes them so easy to pack, plus we dig that they come in the tough little pouch. Again, so easy to pack in limited space, and safe. No human being gets skewered accidentally! Very well made. Would definitely buy more if needed too and they would make a great gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: TLM

customer_reviews.title: Compared to the Bass Pro product these are way better with a carry case and very compact design
customer_reviews.text: I needed to upgrade my fire stick selection for our camper and decided on these. I recently bought one stick at Bass Pro for close to $9, so this set of 5 is a steal! Compared to the Bass Pro product these are way better with a carry case and very compact design! Will be back to buy more as camper warming gifts for friends!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Roasters.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Holds marshmallows on the 2 prongs. Did not get too hot in the metal portion while holding them in the campfire. Handle always stayed cool. Easy to rotate with your thumb while gripping the handle in your palm. Washed up easily. I am excited for the next S'more event.
customer_reviews.author: HappyDay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these as they are super good quality and clean up well. We have had many outdoor marshmallow roasting nights in our backyard and they have help up beautifully. We had one girl over roasting her marshmallow to a burnt crisp and I was worried it would leave the metal black forever, but I was wrong, it cleaned up just fine and the metal is left shiny and new!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Young

customer_reviews.title: Great skewers !!!
customer_reviews.text: These skewers are well made with a nice handle for easy holding. I especially like the extension ithas, safer for use with younger kids!
customer_reviews.author: christmasgifts

customer_reviews.title: Broke first use
customer_reviews.text: Used these for the first time and one of the sticks broke-the telescoping fork pulled right out. Sorta disappointed in the quality, but the overall concept is good. They are light weight, portable, stainless steel. Improvements could be made so these are 100% dishwasher safe and not so cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: minch

customer_reviews.title: Great product and small storage size.
customer_reviews.text: These were just what we were looking for! We like roasting marshmallows on camp trips but the long marshmallow skewers have always been nuisance to pack and store. These pack percectly, expand easily, and clean up quickly. The carry case keeps them together and protected and they fit in a small camping tote for easy storage. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Makes s’mores feel like an event
customer_reviews.text: Love these roasting sticks. They’re sturdy, you can easily rotate your marshmallows while roasting, and they extend to the perfect length to protect kiddos (or smoke-averse grown-ups) from the flames. To clean we burn off excess marshmallow and wipe with baby wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Hapalicious

customer_reviews.title: Can’t turn your marshmallows unless you grab the metal part. Handles not fixed.
customer_reviews.text: These roaster sticks are well made, but the handles aren’t “fixed”. The wooden handles need to be glued to the metal stick so they don’t stay in the same position no matter how many times you try to flip your hotdog over. It’s aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: Kokomo

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?!
customer_reviews.text: SO fun--What a great product!! My husband and I love to make s'mores and this just makes it that much more fun! Plus you can also use them for hot dogs... What's not to love?! The case is cute and they are actually smaller then we thought they would be which is a bonus as they fit in any bag. We may just have to purchase some additional ones, as they would make a great Christmas presents!
customer_reviews.author: Tiny&Olive

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Thsei were exactly what I wanted, and I love the little carrying case. They're easy to clean and even a pretty color. We used them for smores at our cabin on vacation. I'm glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Willis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Rotate with ease, love the color of the handle, prongs could be a tad bit longer for hotdogs but really these roasting sticks and the bag they come in are worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for s’mores
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the grandkids to make s’mores. Worked perfectly. Now we use them to make s’mores for dessert for us! 😀. Love the storage bag, too.
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: The best roasting sticks ever
customer_reviews.text: These are sweet! I got them for a great price on Prime Day. We have used them several times. I like the little carrying case. I also like that the tips aren't super sharp. We had a recent Boy Scout camp out where kids were running around with these crazy sharp skewers! These are much safer and I love that they telescope, it makes storing them super easy.
customer_reviews.author: RPS

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product and customer service went above and beyond to resolve my small complaint
customer_reviews.text: Love these roasting forks and bought them as a Christmas gift but the pouch them came in had a defect on the zipper part. I contacted customer service and they resolved my issue and got it done in time for me to give these as a gift for Christmas. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Travelstovegas

customer_reviews.title: I will be giving these as gifts to family and friends! You'll love them
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW! By far the best roasters I have ever purchased or used. Love the telescoping design, very well fit, not sloppy or loose feeling at all, nice smooth handle with an attractive color. Came with a handy storage bag. Everything reduces and stores neatly in this tiny little bag. Takes up very little room. Great design! I will be buying more and giving these as gifts to family and friends. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Cedar gal

customer_reviews.title: Hope to use soon
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put in our camper. Due to nation wide shut down we haven't had the chance to try this. Hope to soon
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great product and better service
customer_reviews.text: I have very limited use of these roasting sticks but everything has been extremely positive so far. The product is packaged very conveniently and the company is over the top interested in making the customer happy. Great quality for the price. Even if you only use these once a year, they store in such a compact bag, they are not in the way and are easy to grab when you need them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and well made
customer_reviews.text: Used these for hot dogs and s’mores - kids and adults loved them!
customer_reviews.author: FL Esq.

customer_reviews.title: Friends loved them
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift and they used them the first day the got them. I received a text that they worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Floridian

customer_reviews.title: Like these forks.
customer_reviews.text: These marshmallow telescoping forks arrived fast. Live the pouch they store in. They are a present and haven't used them yet, but they seem very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Extendable Rotating Marshmallow Roasting Sticks | Set of 5 Telescoping Forks - Free Bag | Safe, Fun Smores & Hot Dog Stainless Steel Long Camping Skewers | Campfire BBQ Cookware Accessories
feature_bullets: FASTEST MOST EVEN ROASTING! You'll love this compact SMORES KIT!-Want to make perfect smores fast? No more dirty twigs or disposable bamboo skewers! Our portable roasting forks are perfect. Super sturdy, safe for kids around campfires |

HEAVY DUTY STAINLESS STEEL FULLY ADJUSTABLE ROTATING FIRE PIT SKEWERS WITH A SATISFACTION GUARANTEE! -For the cost of dinner you can be roasting hot dogs and marshmallows. Isn't that worth it alone? Real stainless steel skewer with wooden handles, heat resistant bag!

[EASY ROASTING] PERFECT FOR CAMPFIRE, SMORES, HOT DOGS & MORE! NOTHING ELSE COMPARES -Don't price shop; imitators break, don't cook thoroughly, nor are easy to carry & use like ours. You'll wish you found them months ago. Extendable from 10"-34".
Other campfire cooking skewers look great in the picture, yet break easily, are small & flimsy or too big to bring with you. Nothing comes close.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED!! Haven't you waited long enough? Imagine the memories you'll make with these. This investment makes sense.
